nodes.text: Sword Squadron was a starfighter squadron that served with the Imperial Navy. It participated in the Battle of Kelrodo-Ai as part of the 77th Air Wing, where it consisted of three flights: Blade Flight, Dagger Flight, and Scimitar Flight, and at the time was composed of Alpha-3 Nimbus-class V-wing starfighters. By the time of the Galactic Civil War, the unit was equipped with TIE/LN starfighters.
